data.communities: Basis of talk at Melbourne.PM for the 13th August.
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Payroll::AU::PAYG will provide the ability to calculate federal
    PAYG income tax for Australian residents. Given that Payroll::US::*
    provides similar functionality for US residents, the reasoning
    behind the name choice should be clear.

    The module is currently being developed for a demonstration at
    Melb.PM on how simple it can be to write Perl modules, as well as
    for the obvious purpose of calculating tax. I'm very happy for the
    module to be renamed prior to its release.
